e: ￹`Ci~`kapi~ `cingra~ `to~ `Holam~.￺He has a Chinese mistress.￻他有外省籍情婦
￹`Ma~`ka~`kapi~ `ko~ `pi~`layap~ `nira~.￺He got a second gift to go with the first.￻他得雙份禮物，他二者兼得
￹`Ma~`ka~`kapi~ `ko~ `pi~`tatoy~ `nira~.￺He carried something in both hands (for balance).￻他二手各拿東西(為保持平衡)
￹`Ma~`ka~`kapi~ `ko~ `codad~ `ita~ `a~ `tayra~ `i~ `kiyokay~￺We carry companion books to church (Bible and hymnal) .￻我們併拿二本書上教堂(聖經和聖詩)
